name: Puppy Loop
description:
Ludum Dare Jam 2020 October entry. 

Theme - "Stuck in a loop".

Your goal is to save as many of your five puppies from the joys of the puppy dirtifier and the horrors of the puppy bath house.
Rescue the puppies from one of the four conveyor belts and carry them to the safety (?) of your kennel.
Your proficiency is measured by the puppy throughput indicator at the bottom of the game screen, the more puppies you save the higher the pup/sec value.
